column4: I've had multiple burns of Win7 fail from different .iso sources. I have 3 logs saved of failures, and I'm curious if anyone would be able to tell me if it's a hardware or software related issue by looking at the logs? They all fail in the same section of the burn and it shouldn't be the .iso since I've tried multiple.
i suspect you will get the same answer there as you did here, warez is wrong
